jobDescription: Under minimal supervision, collects, analyzes, and interprets various types of data, using varied types of data sets and software, utilizing analytical, statistical and communication skills.  Rice Universitys Baker Institute for Public Policy seeks a Data Analyst to provide technical support, develop queries, run reports, and monitor overall data quality. S/he will work primarily with the universitys CRM software, Blackbaud CRM (OwlConnect), and be responsible for the integration of the CRM with the Baker Institute website.  The Data Analyst will work with key stakeholders within the Baker Institute management team to understand the business needs of the institute, and then addresses those needs through technology, where possible. The Data Analyst works closely with business and technology teams throughout the university to implement solutions that meet the needs.
